20101212170358.143|20101212170359.571|CCO|PRIVILEGED, SEEMINGLY PERFECT

20101212170401.000|20101212170402.667|CCO|DYSFUNCTIONAL FAMILY WITH DARK 
20101212170402.667|20101212170404.333|CCO|AND ULTIMATELY VIOLENT SECRETS.
20101212170404.333|20101212170406.000|CCO|THAT ONE OF THEM IS DEAD WE 
20101212170406.000|20101212170407.667|CCO|KNOW.
20101212170407.667|20101212170409.333|CCO|BUT STILL, THE QUESTION.
20101212170409.333|20101212170411.000|CCO|EXACTLY WHAT HAPPENED HERE?

20101212170422.667|20101212170424.333|CCO|POLK, THEN SUSAN BOLLING, WAS 
20101212170424.333|20101212170426.000|CCO|GROWING UP IN THE SUBURBS OF 
20101212170426.000|20101212170427.667|CCO|OAKLAND, CALIFORNIA.
20101212170427.667|20101212170429.333|CCO|HER PARENTS WERE DIVORCING, AND 
20101212170429.333|20101212170431.000|CCO|HER MOTHER, HELEN, SAID SUSAN

20101212170652.429|20101212170653.857|CCO|THEY DROVE FANCY CARS.

20101212170745.286|20101212170746.714|CCO|SUSAN, AND SOMEONE SHOULD PUT 
20101212170746.714|20101212170748.143|CCO|YOU AWAY."
20101212170748.143|20101212170749.571|CCO|>> Reporter: BY THE TIME THE

20101212171811.667|20101212171812.333|CCO|

20101212171813.000|20101212171813.667|CCO|

20101212172011.000|20101212172016.000|CCO|>>> OVER 20 YEARS THE MARRIAGE 
20101212172016.000|20101212172021.000|CCO|OF SUSAN AND FELIX POLK HAD GONE
20101212172021.000|20101212172023.500|CCO|FROM GOOD TO BAD TO HOPELESS.
20101212172023.500|20101212172026.000|CCO|THREATS, PSYCHOLOGICAL ABUSE, 
20101212172026.000|20101212172028.500|CCO|VIOLENCE.
20101212172028.500|20101212172031.000|CCO|ON OCTOBER 13th, 2002, THE LIFE 
20101212172031.000|20101212172033.000|CCO|OF FELIX POLK CAME TO A TERRIBLE
20101212172033.000|20101212172035.000|CCO|END, AND HIS WIFE WAS LEFT 
20101212172035.000|20101212172037.000|CCO|HOLDING THE KNIFE.

20101212172039.000|20101212172041.000|CCO|WAS LATE EVENING.

20101212172042.250|20101212172043.500|CCO|MOVING OUT.

20101212172048.500|20101212172049.750|CCO|ENRAGED.
20101212172049.750|20101212172051.000|CCO|>> AT A CERTAIN POINT IN THE 
20101212172051.000|20101212172054.333|CCO|CONVERSATION, I THINK THAT I
